caption.p: Best fit of model (3) to the data of a non-human primate and a patient in South Korea treated with lopinavir/ritonavir. (A) Best fit to long-term viral shedding in an adult rhesus macaque [52]; (B) Best fit to the LRT viral load data of the Korean patient treated with lopinavir/ritonavir [50]; (C) Best fit to the URT data of the same patient in (B).
